name: BFDI Character Wiki (Feb 20 2009)
description:
Welcome to "Earliest FIRST BFDI Animation Recreation"!

This game is a recreation of the Old bfdi wiki thing from "Feb 20 2009" you can watch the original on youtube

This game is still in its early stages, so it's not that much at the moment

Ideas: MiniGames, More Characters, Secrets, other stuff

And i think they will be a windows or macOS build in the future, but for know i don't think so.

By the way, please do not reupload this game anywhere! your allowed to share the game to any website showing your love.

Changlogs: 1.2.4b

Renamed Description(Ye ik this is stupid but just deal with it)
